about_the_game:
Rather than confining Earth to a singular form, let's unleash its diversity by shaping it in various forms.
In this interactive experience, you can pause Earth's constant flux and craft your rendition. The paused Earth becomes 'YOUR EARTH,' which you can explore from multiple viewpoints. Moreover, accompanied by ambient music, you can contemplate while witnessing Earth morph into various shapes.
This game promises to alter your perception of our planet.

Distribution Guidelines:
Include the name of the game in the title of the video or live stream. Also, include the URL of the store page in the summary or description section of the video or live stream.
detailed_description:
Rather than confining Earth to a singular form, let's unleash its diversity by shaping it in various forms.
In this interactive experience, you can pause Earth's constant flux and craft your rendition. The paused Earth becomes 'YOUR EARTH,' which you can explore from multiple viewpoints. Moreover, accompanied by ambient music, you can contemplate while witnessing Earth morph into various shapes.
This game promises to alter your perception of our planet.

Distribution Guidelines:
Include the name of the game in the title of the video or live stream. Also, include the URL of the store page in the summary or description section of the video or live stream.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor) Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.

name: YOUR EARTH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10+ SDK.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This game is an earth creation simulation game that allows you to create and view the earth in various shapes.
